messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Active/Alert Child [was.. sassy kids]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 07/30/2000 7:18:58 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Sue: Your counselor should get an award!  I wish that someone had done that for me when I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 07/30/2000 7:18:58 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
sue.m.e@... writes:

> # 11 is a big cause of problems, this empathy in someone so
> young often makes the child mis-read signals. I had major
> problems with my second son, he fit all of the above 11 signs, I
> tried so many ways to find our why he could be such a problem
> child to me and resorted to seeing a child guidance officer,
> fortunatley he was an astute family man who cared for children and
> saw right away where the problem lay.
>


Sue:

Your counselor should get an award! I wish that someone had done that for me
when I was a child (I was an active/alert). My hat is off to you, for taking
the problem in hand and doing something about it.

Keep up the great work,
Amy Aponte
